item.title: Centos-6源
item.description: Base源 cat > /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo << 'EOF' # CentOS-Base.repo # # The mirror system uses the connecting IP address of the client and the # update status of each mirror to pick mirrors that are updated to and # geographically close to the client. You should use this for CentOS updates # unless you are manually picking other mirrors. # # If the
